title: Insta ban people who dont paly  assigned roles
body: If someone gets assigned a role, should they have to play it unless someone else says they can? i mean, if i report a guy, post game for locking top when he got support, should he not get banned? just because you get filled once doesn't give you the right to fuck up the game for others.

replies.body: ive been filled twice in 19 games..... people just need to play a different role once in a while and not be a total baby about it.

Riot wont punish them for that if its only a few times, because believe it or not some people are unlucky enough to be auto filled game after game and get sic of it. Because they get autofilled game 1, they live with it, they get their shield, then people keep dodging games they join then they lose their autofill immunity and get autofilled again, rinse and repeat, and I know after 5 or so times i would get sick of it and play my role for once.

Riot knows that happens so they let a role steal every now and then happen, the only time they ban people for it is if they do it over and over and over without permission.

why the don't have your immunity count after you've completed a full game is beyond me, like did they think this would never happen?

the whole system is just one big shit sandwich and we all have to take a bite.
Because if they had immunity forever after a while they would never find a game again

hmm yeah well as horrible as they are, not much you can do outside of being forced to play the role they ditched, lose your autofill shield and report them (which probably doesn't do much).

It's hard to organise a system to instaban these asshats though, since of course, it would take a tribunal (bring this back) to be able to tell the difference between a dirty lane thief and civil lane negotiations.
